transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Kaveri mam?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Good afternoon mam, Harshita this side from IndiaMART.
Customer: Yes, good afternoon.
Executive: Ha, good afternoon mam. So what is the issue that you are facing mam, can you let me know?
Customer: Uh, yes actually, uh, we, we actually handle, uh, to provide, uh, according like our devices, like our products. So we mainly, uh, sell, uh, gas safety devices but we are not getting the proper buyleads.
Executive: Gas safety devices.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Let me check mam.
Customer: Yes, you can.

Executive: Uh, Surya Delight is another company, right?
Customer: Yes, yes, it's another company.
Executive: And you do not deal in Surya device, Surya Delight.
Customer: Uh, no.
Executive: Okay.


Executive: Are you, we had a discussion earlier also regarding your gas safety devices, right?
Executive: Earlier also you mentioned to me that gas safety devices buyleads are not very much available to you.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay.


Executive: Uh, mam please, uh, hold on a minute, uh, please, uh, stay on call.
Speaker: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Speaker: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, us
Customer: Yes, uh, mam, uh, I'm sending you a, uh, video meet link, please join on that link.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh, mam, I send the link on, uh, your primary email, uh, that is, uh, Anvi, uh, Tech, Belgaum@gmail.com.
Customer: Yes, yes.
Executive: Yes, mam.

Executive: Also recently I could see that, uh, one rating has been given to you regarding your gas pipes. So from Sheikh Dada Kalandar from Andhra Pradesh Nendaz.
Executive: So I guess this is asking the credit from this, uh, person, right?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: But it was not for gas safety device which you want.
Customer: So, uh, like, uh, we have only issues with the getting lead, uh, like, uh, we are not getting a repeated leads, uh, and, uh, about we are, we actually deal in, uh, business, business purpose but we are getting a customer.
Executive: Like you are getting more B2C or retail.
Customer: Yes, yes, only we are getting a B2C but actually we handled in, uh, like deal in a B2B, uh, lead.
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: So also like, uh, how it is, uh, so whatever like a limited, uh, leads we are getting, no. So while after calling the people are saying like clients are saying, uh, like we, we our requirement is closed or some people are not answering and some people are saying like just for, uh, enquiry, uh, they I did enquiry, I don't have any requirement. Like that.
Executive: So for, uh, bulk leads, uh, you should use, uh, bulk filter, right? You should use order filter, order value filter of above 50,000. If you will use that filter, you will get a bulk leads of, uh, and those bulk leads will be mostly for business use only.
Customer: Oh yes, I do all filter that like according the place and the order quantity and the minimum like pricing like bulk order I select no like 50,000 either 10,000. I do all filter, uh, in this.
Executive: Okay, still not getting, uh, bulk leads.
Customer: Yes, uh, after, uh, making all this, uh, like a filter, I'm getting same leads like a repeated, uh, leads. Either the person is not answered or either they say like our requirement is, uh, fulfilled. Like they are saying.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Uh, so mam, uh, have you seen that link that I sent you on your email?
Customer: Uh, yes.
Executive: Uh, please join on that link.
Customer: Oh but, uh, like, uh, I, I can join this but I don't have a that a specific IndiaMART installed in, uh, my, uh, lab. So for, uh, if any.
Executive: It's okay mam, I will, I will share my screen, uh, with you. You, uh, see from my screen only.
Customer: Okay. We can do. Uh, I am joining now.
Executive: Yeah.

Customer: Yes, yes.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting proper buyleads for gas safety devices.

- Getting repeated leads or no response.

- Getting more B2C leads instead of B2B.



Resolution:

- Executive sent a video meet link to customer.

- Executive offered to share screen for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will join the video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gas safety devices, b2b, b2c
